channel.title: Milestone on Live before you leave
channel.description: Recent content in Milestone on Live before you leave

item.title: Owning My First House
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Bino Kochumol Varghese)
item.description:
In this post, we’ll cover how to install Hugo and set up your first website with the Lightbi theme. For detailed steps, refer to Hugo’s quick-start guide.

  1. Create a New Hugo Site 
    hugo new site <name of site>
cd <name of site>
git init
git submodule add https://github.com/binokochumolvarghese/lightbi-hugo themes/lightbi-hugo

  • After completing the steps above, copy the contents of exampleSite/contents into the content folder of your website.
